title: Skin removal upper body lift in 10 days!
text: Hi y’all! I’m 3 yrs post RnY and I finally hit my goal weight and can have skin removal. I’m doing the upper body first, the lower body next June and thighs next fall. I’m very nervous, but SO ready for this new phase of my transformation. I was 286 at my heaviest and I’m now 145. Don’t give up! The work pays off!
